listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: A dark event rocks the remote Arctic town of Fortitude.
Sheriff Anderssen and the police close in on their murder suspect, while DCI Morton follows a different line of inquiry.
Dan and Frank travel up the coast in search of a suspect; Dan's feelings for Elena threaten to overwhelm him.
Following Dan's loss of control, Morton takes over the murder investigation. Elsewhere, Elena's mysterious past is about to catch up with her.

Everyone is a suspect in the murder of Charlie Stoddard, especially Frank and Elena. The Sheriff seems to have some emotional tie to Elena/Esmerelda, and the truth soon comes to light: she spent 7 years in prison for killing an ex-boyfriend who abused her during their relationship, and the Sheriff handles her case to the extent of providing her with a new identity.
While Morton uncovers new information about the death of Billy Pettigrew, Hildur makes a heart-breaking discovery. Another gruesome event occurs in Fortitude.
Panic sweeps through Fortitude as news of the second attack spreads. Dan and Morton must work together while Frank hopes the latest events will exonerate Liam.
While Frank takes the law into his own hands, DCI Morton closes in on the truth about Pettigrew's death. Vincent and Natalie also make a discovery.
DCI Morton pursues Henry Tyson into the Arctic wilderness in search of the truth, while worrying test results force Governor Odegard to take drastic action.
The truth about Billy Pettigrew is revealed. In the lab, Natalie and Vincent probe the cause of the disturbing events in Fortitude.
Vincent faces a life-threatening situation, while Dan must make a devastating decision.

Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.
A fresh murder rocks the town, plunging the remote outpost into new turmoil.
Hildur is presented with devastating news as Dan struggles for his life, and a new threat makes its presence known.
Natalie and Vincent head out into the wilderness and the police track down their suspect, but a dark turn of events leads them to question everything.
Eric struggles to keep control as the body count increases. Meanwhile, Natalie and Vincent's field trip descends into chaos.
A disturbing challenge is issued. Michael finds a glimmer of hope for Freya, while Vincent's trust in Natalie is shattered.
Dr Khatri attempts to cover her tracks when Michael presents the scientists with a miracle. Dan and Elena relive their trauma.
Michael finds something unexpected on the tundra, and Dan is confronted with what he is becoming, just as a heartbreaking discovery changes the town forever.
As the town attempts to come to terms with the recent tragedy, Petra and Ingrid seek the truth. Meanwhile, Dr Khatri moves a step closer to achieving her goal.
Dan faces his toughest battle yet as someone makes the ultimate sacrifice for the greater good, while Michael and Ingrid venture out in search of justice.
The people of Fortitude take matters into their own hands. Dan seeks his own vengeance, but is there still a demon among the herd?

name: Fortitude
plot: Perched on the edge of the Arctic Circle, Fortitude is one of the safest towns on earth. There has never been a violent crime here. Until now.
